SELECT count(0) FROM ( SELECT count(0) FROM sale_income si LEFT JOIN sale_info s ON si.sale_id=s.sale_id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(si.created,'%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
AND s.true_name LIKE '%${saleName}%'
AND s.phone LIKE '%${salePhone}%'
GROUP BY si.sale_id ) AS a

SELECT s.sale_id, s.true_name AS saleName, s.phone AS salePhone, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(b.created,INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m') AS beYearMonth, b.haocai_money, b.haocai_refund, IF(b.haocai_money IS NOT NULL,b.haocai_money,0)- IF(b.haocai_refund IS NOT NULL,b.haocai_refund,0) AS haocaiActual, b.gongju_money, b.gongju_refund, IF(b.gongju_money IS NOT NULL,b.gongju_money,0)- IF(b.gongju_refund IS NOT NULL,b.gongju_refund,0) AS gongjuActual FROM sale_info s LEFT JOIN balance b ON s.sale_id=b.sale_id WHERE b.haocai_money IS NOT NULL AND b.gongju_money IS NOT NULL AND s.sale_id=#{saleId} AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(b.created,INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m') = #{beYearMonth} LIMIT 1
SELECT sale_id, true_name AS saleName, phone AS salePhone FROM sale_info WHERE sale_id=#{saleId} LIMIT 1

SELECT si.order_id, u.true_name AS userName, u.phone AS userPhone, o.state AS orderState, IF(si.order_money_haocai IS NOT NULL,si.order_money_haocai,0)+IF(si.order_money_gongju IS NOT NULL,si.order_money_gongju,0) AS itemSumMoney, si.order_money_haocai, si.order_money_gongju, si.refund_money_haocai, si.refund_money_gongju, (IF(si.order_money_haocai IS NOT NULL,si.order_money_haocai,0)+IF(si.order_money_gongju IS NOT NULL,si.order_money_gongju,0))- (IF(si.refund_money_haocai IS NOT NULL,si.refund_money_haocai,0)+IF(si.refund_money_gongju IS NOT NULL,si.refund_money_gongju,0)) AS actualMoney, o.created AS orderCreated FROM sale_income si INNER JOIN ordera o ON si.order_id=o.order_id INNER JOIN USER u ON o.user_id=u.user_id WHERE si.sale_id=#{saleId} AND DATE_FORMAT(si.created,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY si.sale_income_id LIMIT ${page.currentNumber},${page.numberPerPage}

SELECT count(0) FROM ( SELECT count(0) FROM sale_income si INNER JOIN ordera o ON si.order_id=o.order_id INNER JOIN USER u ON o.user_id=u.user_id WHERE si.sale_id=#{saleId} AND DATE_FORMAT(si.created,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY si.sale_income_id ) AS a
